name: Wind and Freedom
title: Verse of Unchained Happenings
desc: "Someday, the winds will blow towards a brighter future."

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">During this turn, after one of your characters uses a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.(You must have at least 2 characters from Mondstadt in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
